Title: Always
Writer: Jerry Belson (screenplay), Dalton Trumbo (screenplay "A Guy Named Joe"), Frederick Hazlitt Brennan (screenplay adaptation "A Guy Named Joe"), Chandler Sprague (story "A Guy Named Joe"), David Boehm (story "A Guy Named Joe")
Actors: Richard Dreyfuss, Holly Hunter, Brad Johnson, John Goodman
Plot: Pete Sandich and buddy Al Yackey are daredevil aerial forest-fire fighters. Pete finds True Love with Dorinda but won't give up the job. When he takes one risk too many, Dorinda faces deep grief and cannot easily put her life back together.
